sentence: The  fighting  started  almost  a  week  ago  after  Hamas  launched  a  surprise  attack  into  Israel,  killing  1,300  Israelis  and  taking  some  150  hostages  â€”  some  of  whom  are  believed  to  be  Americans.
Palestinian  officials  say  at  least  1,400  people  were  killed,  an  estimated  60%  are  women  and  children,  and  hundreds  of  thousands  of  others  have  been  displaced.
